name: Crash palace Napier
description:
Welcome to Crashpalace Napier, your ultimate home away from home in the heart of Hawke’s Bay! Located at 11 Shakespeare Road, just a short walk from Napier’s iconic Art Deco city center, Crashpalace offers travelers a comfortable, relaxed, and friendly atmosphere.
What We Offer:
• Prime Location: Backpackers Paradise, Perfectly situated near cafes, restaurants, and Napier’s vibrant nightlife, as well as the stunning Marine Parade.
• Cozy Accommodation: A mix of private rooms and dormitories to suit all types of travelers, with freshly renovated spaces designed for comfort and style.
• Facilities: Fully equipped communal kitchen, lounge areas to meet fellow travelers, and outdoor spaces perfect for unwinding.
• Freebies: Complimentary Wi-Fi, parking, and use of linens.
• Local Knowledge: Friendly staff ready to help you explore the best of Hawke’s Bay, from wine tours to scenic coastal adventures.
Crashpalace Napier is more than just a hostel; it’s a community hub for backpackers seeking unforgettable memories. Whether you’re here for adventure, culture, or simply a place to recharge, we’ve got you covered.
We can’t wait to welcome you to our slice of paradise in Hawke’s Bay!
Check in from 2 pm 
Check out till 10 am

houseRules.notes:
Deposit-Only Rates & Cancellation Policy

This property has a 48-hour cancellation policy. Cancellations must be made at least 48 hours before your scheduled check-in time. Failure to cancel within this period will result in a cancellation fee equal to the first night’s stay, unless otherwise stated under ‘Things to Note.’

Things to Note:

• Cancellation Policy: Cancellations must be made at least 48 hours before check-in to avoid a charge equivalent to the first night’s stay.

• Check-in: 14:00 – 21:00

• Reception Hours: 08:30 – 21:00

• Late Check-in: Reception closes at 21:00. Late check-ins after this time are by prior arrangement only and incur a $5 late check-in fee.

• If you require a late check-in, please contact our reception in advance via phone or email. Without prior arrangement, we cannot guarantee that someone will be available to grant access to the building.
